alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 4:29AM CDT until April 27 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL PEARL RIVER COUNTY... At 428 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mcneil, or 8 miles southwest of Poplarville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Poplarville and Mcneil. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 15 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
